Class FiniteDimensionalVectorSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • definitions.structures.euclidean.vectorspaces.impl.FiniteDimensionalVectorSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XmlPrintable, Group, Monoid, SemiGroup, InnerProductSpace, MetricSpace, NormedSpace, VectorSpace, VectorSpaceMethods, EuclideanSpace, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComplexPlane, FiniteDimensionalFunctionSpace, FunctionalSpace, QuaternionSpace

    public class FiniteDimensionalVectorSpace
extends java.lang.Object
implements EuclideanSpace
    Author:
    RoManski Conrete implementation of a finite dimensional vector space.
